snippet: The Koss Striva Pro headphones are a great idea-they connect by Wi-Fi instead Bluetooth for a better fidelity-but it will take some work to make them a great product.
abstract: The Koss Striva Pro headphones are a great idea-they connect by Wi-Fi instead Bluetooth for a better fidelity-but it will take some work to make them a great product.

headline.main: Koss Wi-Fi Headphones: Sound Idea, Fuzzy Execution
headline.print_headline: Wi-Fi Headphones Sound Good, but Operation Is Tricky
